Comment.val: /*Creates and sends reply by using the meta data of the initial calc run.*/

Text.val: Reply succesfully sent then check if there are manual steps present:

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sfpr_state_trail t INNER JOIN sfpr_states s ON s.state_id = t.state_id WHERE t.cfh_id IN ( SELECT DISTINCT h.cfh_id FROM servicefee_calc_run r INNER JOIN servicefee_hdr h ON h.sfcr_id = r.id WHERE r.ppr_id = ~1 AND r.reference_date = to_date(~2, 'YYYYMMDD') ) AND s.error_ind = 1 AND s.state_id IN (362,381,520)
